# Setting Up Environment
```{r}
#| document: show
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(sf)

Somerville <- read_csv("Somerville_Happiness_Survey_Responses.csv") |>
  filter(Year == 2025, !is.na(Education.Quality.Satisfaction.num), !is.na(Housing.Condition.Satisfaction.num), !is.na(Feel.Part.Community.num), !is.na(Somerville.Satisfaction.num)) |>
  select(ID, Year, Age, Gender, Race.Ethnicity, Household.Income, Education.Quality.Satisfaction.num, Education.Quality.Satisfaction.label, Housing.Condition.Satisfaction.num, Housing.Condition.Satisfaction.label, Feel.Part.Community.num, Feel.Part.Community.label, Somerville.Satisfaction.num, Somerville.Satisfaction.label)
```
